name: Seashell pearl necklace
description:

Presented in a gorgeous chocolate brown organza bag.

Click on photo to enlarge

Dimensions:Length 42 cm Pearl size 12mm

Product code: 214N Pearl 
*Seashell pearls  are created by dipping a round  bead into a coloured solution of binders and crushed mother of pearl. They are polished and dipped, again and again, until they reach the size desired. They are  heavier than real pearls.
